attributes.action: Proclaim St Georges Day as a National Holiday for England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the increasing awareness of English identity (albeit against the best effirts of the current government), St George's day presents the ideal opportunity to celebrate the  nationhood of the biggest constituent country of the United Kingdom.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Proclaim St Georges Day as a National Holiday for England."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page10843.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/ST-GEORGES/
